<COOLEDNODES><INFO sitename="Everything2" site="http://everything2.com" servertime="Thu Nov 27 20:05:22 2014">Rendered by the Cool Nodes XML Ticker</INFO> <cooled cooledby_user="mauler" node_id="2050275" parent_e2node="1805312" author_user="haqiqat">.577 Tyrannosaur</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="go ahead I'll listen" node_id="1525331" parent_e2node="1525329" author_user="Scriblerus">So much it scares me</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="mauler" node_id="2047828" parent_e2node="1810329" author_user="haqiqat">Duty is weightier than a mountain, but death is lighter than a feather</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="iceowl" node_id="1912618" parent_e2node="1911726" author_user="vstarre">o ;pbr upi</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="moeyz" node_id="2117309" parent_e2node="2117311" author_user="lizardinlaw">Random Weird Root Vegetable Soup</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="legbagede" node_id="1233367" parent_e2node="37295" author_user="Jetifi">GSM</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="haqiqat" node_id="2068669" parent_e2node="2068673" author_user="dannye">Lucky and Biscuithead go down to the crossroads</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="Jet-Poop" node_id="2117011" parent_e2node="2117010" author_user="Glowing Fish">Still Valley</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="lizardinlaw" node_id="1319029" parent_e2node="1192963" author_user="erevapisces">Do you even realize how much your spirit illuminates? It is like stars.</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="lizardinlaw" node_id="2117349" parent_e2node="2117350" author_user="Chord">November Winter</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="moeyz" node_id="2100175" parent_e2node="12627" author_user="avalyn">Android</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="Glowing Fish" node_id="1755475" parent_e2node="39826" author_user="henry flower">Hatred</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="Jet-Poop" node_id="2117008" parent_e2node="35280" author_user="mauler">bless</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="Jet-Poop" node_id="2116991" parent_e2node="794523" author_user="avalyn">Sean Bean</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="Jet-Poop" node_id="2116976" parent_e2node="2116973" author_user="Glowing Fish">Too Many Cooks</cooled>
